Title: Transit
Actors: Itzhak Ben-Zur, Gedalia Besser, Yair Elazar, Ruth Geller
Plot: Erich Nussbaum is a Jew who fled from Germany before the horrors of World War ll. He has settled in Israel for many years, but has always found it hard to adjust to life in his new homeland. He considers returning to Germany as he tires of trying to go through life as though nothing has happened.
